description: Clarity table for extracting Danish kontakt information.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hosp acct / kontakt record.

columns.name: RFL_START_DATE
columns.description: The manually entered referral start date if there is no referral associated with the account. Only used for Denmark accounts.

columns.name: RFL_DX_ID
columns.description: The manually entered referral diagnosis if there is no referral associated with the account. Only used for Denmark accounts.
